Odeakwụkwọ nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Pan-African na-enye nkwado nchịkwa na Nzukọ Ndị Ọchịchị Pan-Afirka.

Ndị odeakwụkwọ mejupụtara ya bụ onye odeakwụkwọ, ugbu a [mgbe?] Yusupha Jobe, na ndị osote odeakwụkwọ abụọ, ugbu a [mgbe?Gali Massa Harou (azụmahịa iwu) na Charlotte Marck (ego, nchịkwa na mmekọrịta mba ụwa).

Dịka onye isi nke odeakwụkwọ, onye odeakwụkwọ na-elekọta ndị ọrụ ya, na-ahazi ntuli aka nke ndị isi oche na ndị osote onye isi ala, na-ewe nkeji oge nke usoro nzuko omeiwu na kọmitii na-adịgide adịgide ma na-akwado votu nke oche ọ bụla site na mbinye aka.  Ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka nzuko omeiwu maka okwu ndekọ ego ma na-ejikwa nchịkwa ya kwa ụbọchị.
